titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Henry Bienen papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-06-18T11:08-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: Drafts of an unpublished chapter of a book, minutes of meetings, reports, pamphlets, and newspaper clippings, relating to Tanzanian political development.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Henry Bienen papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1972.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: An American political scientist, Henry S. Bienen served as President of Northwestern University from 1994 to 2009.
Sources: "Henry S. Bienen is the President Emeritus" http://www.northwestern.edu/Bienen/

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Drafts of an unpublished chapter of a book, minutes of meetings, reports, pamphlets, and newspaper clippings, relating to Tanzanian political development.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes manuscript draft of chapter on a "Five Year Plan," reports, and notes.

did.unittitle: Election of 1965, report on voting results and newspaper clippings
Party personnel lists and biographical sketches of political figures
Republic Day, 9 December 1962, Sunday News Supplement
Tanganyika African National Union (TANU), Minutes of Central Committee and National Executive Committee, and Annual Conferences
